title: Drawing, "Arabesque design for a panel", 1780–90
medium: Pen and ink, brush and wash, pencil on paper.
markings: watermark: Strasburg lily and bend over
creditline: Purchased for the Museum by the Advisory Council
description: Candelabrum with two lateral framing growths.  The central stem consists of a calyx section, a base with crouching lions flanking an ovoidal medallion, an urn, a thyrsus.  Framing strip.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Arabesque design for a panel", 1780–90.
1780–90. Pen and ink, brush and wash, pencil on paper.. Purchased for the Museum by the Advisory Council. 1908-26-131.
